sentence: Stepan Company ( SCL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on March 02, 2016.
A cash dividend payment of $0.19 per share is scheduled to be paid on March 15, 2016.
Shareholders who purchased SCL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 5.56% increase over the same period a year ago.
The previous trading day's last sale of SCL was $49.68, representing a -10.76% decrease from the 52 week high of $55.67 and a 31.95% increase over the 52 week low of $37.65.
SCL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
SCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.03.
Zacks Investment Research reports SCL's forecasted earnings growth in 2016 as 4.05%, compared to an industry average of -3.1%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SCL Dividend History page.
